item.title: BoyWithUke - Toxic
item.description:
All my friends are
toxic all ambitionless
So rude
and always negative
I need
new friends
But it’s not
that quick and easy
Oh I’m drowning
let me breathe
I’m better off
all by myself
Though
I’m feeling kinda
Empty
without somebody else
Oh I hear you crying
out for help
But you never
showed for me
When I was ringing
your cell phone
Oh you don’t
know
How it feels
to be alone
Baby
oh I’ll make you know
I’ll make
you know oh

let me breathe

let me breathe

backin’ it up a bit

and knockin’ on wood
Avoidin’ my opposites
chewin’ on chocolate

but I should
Be good for a minute
don’t want to admit it

I’m rigid I’m screwed

bottles
And bottles
of booze

all by myself

take my light

how I

item.title: BoyWithUke - IDGAF (Feat.blackbear)
item.description:
You were caught
in a lie
Said it with your eyes
said to all my homies
That you weren’t
even mine
You didn’t think
twice
Got a heart
made of ice
And that sxxx hit me
did me dirty
I never asked why
and I never did cry
I never told another
how I felt inside
My demons don’t
hide
When I’m dreaming
at night
And
I won’t mislead you
You’ll
miss me
‘Cause
I don’t give a fxxx
About you
no more
Give me back
my hoodies
Or I’m kickin’ down
doors
You weren’t even
pretty
Lookin’ back
and I’m sure
You still miss me
that’s so funny
I don’t give a fxxx
about you you swore
You would never
talk about me before
You lied lookin’
filthy
In your ugly
jean shorts
You still kissed me
now sxxx’s history
I don’t mind
if we speak again
I don’t wanna
be cool
I don’t wanna
be friends
Leave me half alive
on my homies
You was flirty
filled me up with lies
And you did me
so dirty
‘Cause
I don’t give a fxxx
About you no more
left me bleedin’
With my heart
on the floor
You were never
really mine
I was never
really yours
You’re the demon
on my shoulder
I’m just tryin’
to ignore
And
I don’t give a sxxx
About your fake-axx
friends
Hollywood Hills
while we play pretend
I don’t wanna say
I’m sorry
I don’t wanna
make amends
I will never
make a mistake
Like you
again
‘Cause
I don’t give a fxxx
About you
no more
Give me back
my hoodies
Or I’m kickin’ down
doors
You weren’t even
pretty
Lookin’ back
and I’m sure
You still miss me
that’s so funny
I don’t give a fxxx
about you you swore
You would never
talk about me before
You lied lookin’
filthy
In your ugly
jean shorts
You still kissed me
now sxxx’s history
Regardless
you’re so heartless
Lead my heart
into your darkness
Hid the truth
behind
Your harmless
pretty face
And
I know
You’re runnin’ out
of other options
Live in your head rent
free a neurotoxin
And I wake up
every morning
With a smile
in my face
Knowin’ full
well you were
Put up
for adoption
Oh sxxx
yeah I went there
But honestly
I don’t care
You never tried
to play fair with me
Left me broken
with scars
Makin’
all these remarks
So now this is
the part where I leave
‘Cause
I don’t give a fxxx
About you
no more
Give me back
my hoodies
Or I’m kickin’ down
doors
You weren’t even
pretty
Lookin’ back
and I’m sure
You still miss me
that’s so funny
I don’t give a fxxx
about you you swore
You would never
talk about me before
You lied lookin’
filthy
In your ugly
jean shorts
You still kissed me
now sxxx’s history
